form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to modify the requirements relating to truthful cost or pricing data submissions, and for other purposes.

section.header: Modification to truthful cost or pricing data submissions
section.text: Section 3705(b)(2)(B) of title 10, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the second sentence, by inserting and shall identify such offerors that incur a delay greater than 200 days in submitting such cost or pricing data after should-cost analysis; and

by amending the third sentence to read as follows: The Secretary of Defense shall include a public notation on such offerors in the system used by the Federal Government to monitor or record contractor integrity and performance..
